data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字

Values ____ tables ____ be ____ either ____ commas ____ semicolons, and ____ may ____ on ____ lines. data.partBlankContent: Tables may contain values of any type except nil. This i_ logical: nil repre_____ the abs____ of a value. Inserting `` the abs____ of a value '' in a table wouldn't make se___. Values i_ tables m__ be sepa_____ either b_ commas o_ semicolons, and th__ may cont____ on ma__ lines. data.fullContent: Tables may contain values of any type except nil. This is logical: nil represents the absence of a value. Inserting `` the absence of a value '' in a table wouldn't make sense. Values in tables may be separated either by commas or semicolons, and they may continue on many lines. It is common to use commas for single-line table constructors and semicolons for multi-line tables, but this is not necessary.
data.answer: 表格可以包含除零之外的任何类型的值。这是合乎逻辑的:零表示没有值。在表中插入“缺少值”是没有意义的。表中的值可以用逗号或分号分隔，它们可以在多行中继续。对于单行表构造函数通常使用逗号，对于多行表通常使用分号，但这不是必需的。
